i18n-t/keypath.description:
[required]
The locale message key can be specified prop

i18n-t/plural.description:
[optional]
The Plural Choosing the message number prop

i18n-t/locale.description:
[optional]
The locale to be used for the component

i18n-t/scope.description:
[optional]	The scope to be used in the target component.
You can specify either `global` or `parent`

i18n-t/tag.description:
[optional]
Used to wrap the content that is distribute in the slot.
If omitted, the slot content is treated as Fragments

i18n-d/value.description:
[required]
The value specified for the target component

i18n-d/format.description:
[optional]
The format to use in the target component

i18n-d/locale.description:
[optional]
The locale to be used for the component

i18n-d/scope.description:
[optional]	The scope to be used in the target component.
You can specify either `global` or `parent`

i18n-d/tag.description:
[optional]
Used to wrap the content that is distribute in the slot.
If omitted, the slot content is treated as Fragments
